'''0.0.15a_01'''{{cn}} is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 4, 2009, at 17:15 UTC.<ref name="restart">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[11:15] <@Notch> restart your clients to get no more vanishing players''" (17:15 UTC)</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed a bug with vanishing players.<ref name="restart"/>

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* This version was very prone to crashing.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[11:20] <Stargoat> it keeps crashing me out :(''" [...] "''[11:20] <Stargoat> but it crashed me out within 20 seconds of rejoining''" [...] "''[11:29] <Bujold> Am I the only for whom it crashed?''" [...] "''[11:36] <Bujold> Crashed again, is it Notch playing with some the server?''" [...] "''[11:39] <justinforasec> i crashed''" (17:20 to 17:39 UTC)</ref>
